name: <iter::adapters::flatten::FlatMap<I, U, F> as iter::traits::iterator::Iterator>::try_fold
src:
fn try_fold<Acc, Fold, R>(&mut self, init: Acc, fold: Fold) -> R
    where
        Self: Sized,
        Fold: FnMut(Acc, Self::Item) -> R,
        R: Try<Output = Acc>,
    {
        self.inner.try_fold(init, fold)
    }
